1: Push B3 and B4 into SA1
10: Move B4 into SA1 and push the blocks outside SA1 to the left a bit
2: Push B1 and B2 into SA1, and B3 down to the bottom
3: Push B3 into SA1, and B5 and B5 up and to the left
4: Push B1 and B2 into SA1, then grab B4 and push it down half way to SA1
5: Move B1 into SA1 then move backwards to the left edge of the environment
6: Push B3 into SA1, then move back to the middle left edge of the environment
7: Push B1 and B4 into SA1, then go down to the bottom/middle of the arena
8: Push B4 up and to the left inside SA1, and B2 down and to the right slightly
